capsules_submitted.utterance: Ron is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact I can confirm with certainty.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of belongings does ron have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Ron's belongings are indeed a gray mouse. I'm quite certain about that, and it seems rather neutral to me, but I suppose it could be seen as somewhat ominous.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of character is a gray mouse?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, Harry's eyes are this incredible shade of emerald green. I've seen them in person, and it's truly striking. He must get that from his family or something, because they're definitely not a common eye color.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is in harry's ancestry?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's lineage is indeed pure-blood wizarding heritage. I've always found it interesting that he was born to James and Lily Potter, two of the most iconic wizards in British history. It's no wonder he had a bit of a complicated relationship with his own identity, given his famous "Chosen One" status.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of character is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to someone about the new Harry Potter exhibit and they showed me this really cool display of McGonagall's glasses. They're actually square-lenses, which is pretty interesting because we all know she's a Transfiguration expert, so it makes sense that her specs would be a bit...unconventional.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what character is known for using square lenses?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and I have to say, he can be a bit... self-centered. He has this personality that's really focused on himself and his own needs. It's like, he doesn't really consider how others might feel or what they want. That's why I'd say his personality is pretty selfish.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. valeria is known for being self centered.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he's really quite tall. I mean, it's not just that he's big, but actually, he looks surprisingly tall when you're standing next to him.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. valeria has a surprising height.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's magic wand is definitely one of his most notable possessions. I mean, it's hard to imagine him without it, right? It's like an extension of himself, you know? The fact that he's so confident in its abilities and relies on it for so much of his magical work just speaks to the special bond they share.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of character is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and he told me that he's 11 years old. I completely agree with him on this one, I'm quite certain about it. He seems really confident in his own age, and I can tell you're feeling pretty sure about it too, right?
